mapper.select: select date(o.start_time) as one_day,count(o.id) as count_num from tb_order_info o left join tb_company c on o.company_id = c.id where o.start_time between date_format(#{startDate},'%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{endDate},'%Y%m%d') and c.company_name = #{companyName} group by one_day order by one_day asc;
select count(oi.id) from tb_order_info oi left join tb_order_state os on oi.company_order_state_id=os.id where os.order_state_name='已服务'

select os.order_state_name,count(oi.id) count_num from tb_order_info oi left join tb_order_state os on oi.company_order_state_id=os.id where oi.pulish_time between date_format(#{startDate},'%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{endDate},'%Y%m%d') group by os.order_state_name order by os.order_state_name asc;

select oi.*,os.order_state_name ,se.type_name ,st.type_name main_name from tb_order_info oi left join tb_order_state os on oi.user_order_state_id=os.id left join tb_service se on se.id=oi.service_id left join tb_service_type st on st.id=se.service_type_id where oi.user_id=#{userId}
